## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.toogleSingle() method

Toggles the state of a single accordion item. If the accordion is not collapsible and the item is being opened, the action is ignored. Otherwise, it updates the internal value to either `null` (if closing) or the provided `value` (if opening).

This method is used for managing the single accordion item toggle behavior, ensuring that only one item is open at a time when the accordion is not collapsible.


**Signature:**

```typescript
protected toogleSingle(value: T, isOpen: boolean): void;
```

value


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The value to check. This can be any type defined for the accordion values (e.g., string, number, etc.).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

isOpen


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Indicates whether the accordion item is being opened (`true`<!-- -->) or closed (`false`<!-- -->).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->void<!-- -->} This method does not return anything.
